TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Parameter extends System.Object implements class System.ICloneable, class System.Web.UI.IStateManager
Public Class Parameter Implements ICloneable, IStateManager
public ref class Parameter : ICloneable, System::Web::UI::IStateManager

summary.span: 提供一種機制，資料來源控制項可使用該機制繫結至應用程式變數、使用者識別和選項，以及其他資料。

span.span: Provides a mechanism that data source controls use to bind to application variables, user identities and choices, and other data.

summary.span: 作為所有 ASP.NET 參數類型的基底類別。

span.span: Serves as the base class for all ASP.NET parameter types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別代表參數在參數化 SQL 查詢中，篩選運算式，或商務物件方法呼叫 ASP.NET 資料來源控制項用來選取、 篩選，或修改資料。The class represents a parameter in a parameterized SQL query, a filtering expression, or a business object method call that an ASP.NET data source control uses to select, filter, or modify data. 物件包含在 物件中。 objects are contained in a object. 物件會評估在執行階段，以將它們所表示的任何方法可由資料來源控制項來與資料互動的變數值繫結。 objects are evaluated at run time, to bind the values of the variables they represent to whatever method is used by a data source control to interact with data. 使用衍生自的與資料來源和資料繫結控制項，以建置 Web 架構資料應用程式。Use classes that derive from with data source and data-bound controls to build Web-based data applications. 這些參數類別用於資料來源控制項繫結特定類型的預留位置，在 SQL 查詢字串、 商務物件方法參數和多個 Web 應用程式中的值。These parameter classes are used by data source controls to bind specific kinds of values found in Web applications to placeholders in SQL query strings, business object method parameters, and more. 下表列出包含在 ASP.NET 中的參數類型。The following table lists parameter types that are included in ASP.NET. ||| |-|-| ||將繫結的 Web 伺服器控制項的任何公用屬性。Binds any public property of a Web server control.| ||將繫結的表單欄位。Binds a form field.| ||將繫結工作階段狀態欄位。Binds a session-state field.| ||路由 URL 參數來繫結。Binds a route URL parameter.| ||將繫結 cookie 欄位。Binds a cookie field.| ||將繫結的查詢字串參數。Binds a query-string parameter.| ||將繫結的設定檔的欄位。Binds a profile field.| 擴充基底類別，當您想要實作您自己的自訂參數類型。Extend the base class when you want to implement your own custom parameter types. 物件是非常簡單： 它們有和屬性，可表示以宣告方式，並可以追蹤多個 HTTP 要求的狀態。 objects are very simple: they have a and a property, can be represented declaratively, and can track state across multiple HTTP requests. 所有參數都支援屬性情況下，參數會繫結為一個值，但值評估為`null`在執行階段。All parameters support a property, for cases when a parameter is bound to a value, but the value evaluates to `null` at run time. 使用的集合時物件與資料來源控制項，可能會影響集合的順序。When using a collection of objects with a data source control, their order in the collection might matter. 如需有關如何使用參數的詳細資訊，請參閱[使用參數與 SqlDataSource 控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295)和[ObjectDataSource 控制項配合使用參數](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45fb67ee-9be7-49b7-9421-e242203dafa4)。For more information on how parameters are used, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295) and [Using Parameters with the ObjectDataSource Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45fb67ee-9be7-49b7-9421-e242203dafa4). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用選取的值W 中的控制`here`子句的 SQL 查詢。The following example shows how to use the selected value of a control in the W`here` clause of a SQL query. 此範例會使用類別，衍生自類別。The example uses the class, which derives from the class. 元素定義具有一個名為參數的查詢"@Title"其中的值從`DropDownList1`應。The element defines the query with a parameter named "@Title" where the value from `DropDownList1` should go. 元素會指定"@Title"的值會取代預留位置屬性`DropDownList1`控制項。The element specifies that the "@Title" placeholder will be replaced by the value of the property of the `DropDownList1` control. 項目加入至集合控制項。The element is added to the collection of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_2sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_2sql/CS/sql2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_2sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_2sql/VB/sql2vb.aspx#1)] 下列範例類似，但使用程式碼，而非標記。The following example is like the previous one, but uses code instead of markup. 當網頁載入第一次，控制項沒有任何選取的值，而屬性物件使用。When the page loads the first time, the control has no selected value, and the property of the object is used. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter_3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter_3/CS/param1acs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter_3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter_3/VB/param1avb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼在上述範例中顯示網頁的程式碼後置類別。The following code shows the code-behind class for the page in the previous example. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter_3#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter_3/CS/param1acs.aspx.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter_3#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter_3/VB/param1avb.aspx.vb#4)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何擴充類別以建立可供資料來源控制項和資料繫結案例中的其他控制項的新參數類型。The following code example demonstrates how to extend the class to create a new parameter type that can be used by data source controls and other controls in data-binding scenarios. 可以使用資料來源控制項`StaticParameter`Web Form 網頁上宣告的參數來繫結至任何物件，通常的字串值。A data source control can use a `StaticParameter` parameter to bind to the value of any object, typically a string, declared on a Web Forms page. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter_2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter_2/CS/staticparameter.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter_2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter_2/VB/staticparameter.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式是`protected`複製建構函式用來複製執行個體。The constructor is a `protected` copy constructor used to clone a instance. 值， ， ， ，和屬性會傳送到新的執行個體。The values of the , , , , and properties are all transferred to the new instance. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫建構函式，從該類別可擴充類別以實作正確的物件複製之類別的行為。The following code example demonstrates how to call the constructor from a class that extends the class to implement correct object cloning behavior for the class. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class overview. summary.span: 傳回目前 執行個體的複製。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法呼叫複製建構函式來初始化的新執行個體類別目前的執行個體的值。The method calls the copy constructor to initialize a new instance of the class with the values of the current instance. 如果您擴充類別，您可以覆寫方法，將包含任何應複製到您的衍生類別的新執行個體的狀態。If you extend the class, you can override the method to include any state that should be copied to a new instance of your derived class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫建構函式，從該類別可擴充類別以實作正確的物件複製之類別的行為。The following code example demonstrates how to call the constructor from a class that extends the class to implement correct object cloning behavior for the class. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter_2#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter_2/CS/staticparameter.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter_2#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter_2/VB/staticparameter.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Data::DbType DbType { System::Data::DbType get(); void set(System::Data::DbType value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定參數的資料庫型別。

span.span: Gets or sets the database type of the parameter.

value.span: 執行個體的資料庫型別。

span.span: The database type of the instance.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料庫類型可用來建立強型別的參數，以便您的 Web 應用程式與基礎程式碼或從資料庫資料表的值之間轉換的值正確。The database type can be used to create strongly typed parameters, so that values are converted correctly between your Web application and underlying code or values from database tables. 如果資料庫變更的類型參數是藉由設定屬性，方法呼叫。If the database type of the parameter is changed by setting the property, the method is called.

exception.span: 已嘗試將此屬性設定為不屬於 列舉中的值。

span.span: An attempt was made to set this property to a value that is not in the enumeration.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DefaultValue { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 指定參數的預設值，當呼叫 方法時，要繫結的值應是此參數未初始化的值。

span.span: Specifies a default value for the parameter, should the value that the parameter is bound to be uninitialized when the method is called.

value.span: 當無法解析或未初始化其繫結至的值時，這個字串會做為 的預設值。

span.span: A string that serves as a default value for the when the value it is bound to cannot be resolved or is uninitialized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性時，可使用其中一個值，繫結參數，但的值是`null`或無法解析時評估物件。The property is used in scenarios where the parameter is bound to a value, but the value is `null` or cannot be resolved when the object is evaluated. 如果屬性參數的變更，方法呼叫。If the property of the parameter is changed, the method is called. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何擷取單一資料記錄使用控制，並顯示在控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve a single data record using an control and display it in a control. 控制項擷取特定員工記錄藉由呼叫`GetEmployee`方法`EmployeeLogic`類別。The control retrieves a specific employee record by calling the `GetEmployee` method of the `EmployeeLogic` class. `GetEmployee`方法要求員工識別碼參數。The `GetEmployee` method requires an employee ID parameter. 控制使用物件存放至其集合傳遞至 ID`GetEmployee`在此範例中的方法。The control uses a object in its collection to pass an ID to the `GetEmployee` method in this example. 若要檢視的範例實作`EmployeeLogic`類別和`GetEmployee`方法，請參閱類別概觀。To view the example implementation of the `EmployeeLogic` class and the `GetEmployee` method, see the class overview. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_3/CS/objds3cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_3/VB/objds3vb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Data::ParameterDirection Direction { System::Data::ParameterDirection get(); void set(System::Data::ParameterDirection value); };

summary.span: 表示此 物件是否用來將值繫結至控制項，或是這個控制項是否可用來變更該值。

span.span: Indicates whether the object is used to bind a value to a control, or the control can be used to change the value.
One of the values.
is set to by default.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性目前不是由類別，並保留供未來使用。The property is currently not used by the class and is reserved for future use. 屬性描述的值之間的資料流程方向的繫結至執行個體和物件本身。The property describes the direction of the flow of data between the value that a instance is bound to and the object itself. 預設值為屬性， ，描述最常見的案例資料的流程會以單一方向： 的值從物件繫結至物件。The default value for the property, , describes the most common scenario where the flow of data is always in one direction: from the value to which the object is bound to the object. 基礎值所做的變更會反映由物件，但任何變更物件不會反映基礎資料。Any changes made to the underlying value are reflected by the object, but any changes to the object are not reflected by the underlying data. 您可以設定屬性或輸出參數使用時或時使用預存程序的傳回值。You can set the property to or when working with output parameters, or when working with a return value from a stored procedure. 如果屬性參數的變更，方法呼叫。If the property of the parameter is changed, the method is called. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定， ，和屬性物件時使用它們做為輸出參數和傳回值參數，預存程序。The following code example demonstrates how to set the , , and properties of objects when using them as output parameters and return value parameters with a stored procedure. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class overview. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs_1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs_1/CS/sql21cs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs_1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs_1/VB/sql21vb.aspx#2)]

summary.span: 更新並傳回 物件的值。

span.span: Updates and returns the value of the object.
An that represents the updated and current value of the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設實作方法會傳回`null`在所有情況下。The default implementation of the method is to return `null` in all cases. 類別衍生自類別覆寫方法以傳回更新的參數值。Classes that derive from the class override the method to return an updated parameter value. 例如，物件傳回的值，繫結控制項時物件會擷取從目前的名稱/值組物件。For example, the object returns the value of the control that it is bound to, while the object retrieves the current name/value pair from the object. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法來傳回正確的值衍生自的類別中類別。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method to return the correct value in a class that is derived from the class. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class overview. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter_2#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter_2/CS/staticparameter.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter_2#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter_2/VB/staticparameter.vb#6)]

summary.span: 將資料來源檢視還原成之前所儲存的檢視狀態。

span.span: Restores the data source view's previously saved view state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法主要供.NET Framework 基礎結構，並不是直接從您的程式碼使用。This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 不過，控制項開發人員可以覆寫這個方法，以指定自訂的伺服器控制項如何還原其檢視狀態。However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 狀態管理概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce). 這個方法會還原檢視狀態資訊物件所儲存的先前頁面要求從方法。This method restores view-state information for the object from a previous page request that was saved by the method.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定參數的名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the parameter.
The name of the parameter.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件不需要有名稱。不過，資料來源控制項可能會使用參數名稱來比對使用 SQL 查詢或商務方法簽章中參數集合中的物件。 objects are not required to have a name; however, data source controls might use the parameter name to match a object in a collection with a parameter in a SQL query or business method signature. 例如，控制項就可以使用名稱物件來比對參數化 SQL 查詢中的預留位置。For example, the control can use the name of the object to match a placeholder in a parameterized SQL query. 同樣地，控制項就可以使用名稱物件存放至集合以符合中的預留位置屬性。Similarly, the control can use the name of a object in the collection to match a placeholder in the property. 在某些情況下，不使用名稱和順序物件加入至集合是更重要。In some cases, the name is not used and the order in which the object is added to a collection is more important. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[使用參數與 SqlDataSource 控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295)和[ObjectDataSource 控制項配合使用參數](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45fb67ee-9be7-49b7-9421-e242203dafa4)。For more information, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295) and [Using Parameters with the ObjectDataSource Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45fb67ee-9be7-49b7-9421-e242203dafa4). 如果參數的名稱已變更，方法呼叫。If the name of the parameter is changed, the method is called. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何顯示篩選的資料使用來自中介層商務物件擷取資料的控制項和控制項來顯示結果。The following code example demonstrates how to display filtered data using an control to retrieve data from a middle-tier business object and a control to display the results. 程式碼範例包含控制項，控制項，控制項，以及送出按鈕。The code example consists of a control, a control, the control, and a Submit button. 根據預設，控制項填入其中名稱`Northwind`員工。By default, the control is populated with the name of one of the `Northwind` employees. 控制項顯示的資訊中的名稱所識別的員工控制項。The control displays information about the employee identified by the name in the control. 若要擷取另一位員工的資料，請輸入中的員工的完整名稱控制，然後按一下按鈕。To retrieve data on another employee, enter the full name of the employee in the control and click the button. 屬性會指定用來篩選所擷取的資料運算式屬性。The property specifies an expression used to filter the data retrieved by the property. 它會使用參數預留位置中所包含的參數進行評估之集合。It uses parameter placeholders that are evaluated to the parameters contained in the collection. 在此範例中，參數預留位置會受限於單一引號因為參數類型是可能含有空格的字串類型。In this example, the parameter placeholder is bounded by single quotation marks because the type of the parameter is a string type that might contain spaces. 如果參數的型別是數值或日期類型，不需要繫結的引號。If the type of the parameter is a numeric or date type, bounding quotation marks are not needed. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分屬性類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the property of the class. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9/CS/objds9cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9/VB/objds9vb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance void OnParameterChanged() cil managed

summary.span: 呼叫 集合的 方法，該集合包含給定的 物件。

span.span: Calls the method of the collection that contains the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果物件不包含集合，並呼叫方法沒有任何作用。If the object is not contained by a collection, calling the method has no effect. 如果所包含物件集合，引發事件的集合。If the object is contained by a collection, raises the event of the collection. 如果集合包含的資料來源控制項，事件引發資料來源控制項的事件，造成任何資料繫結的控制項重新繫結。If the collection is contained by a data source control, the event raises the data source control's event, causing any data-bound controls to rebind. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫方法，以引發事件參數的狀態變更時。The following code example demonstrates how to call the method to raise the event when the state of a parameter changes. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class overview. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter_2#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter_2/CS/staticparameter.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter_2#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter_2/VB/staticparameter.vb#7)]

para.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance object SaveViewState() cil managed
Protected Overridable Function SaveViewState () As Object

summary.span: 儲存自頁面回傳至伺服器以來 物件檢視狀態的變更。

span.span: Saves the changes to the object's view state since the time the page was posted back to the server.

returns.span: 包含 檢視狀態變更的 。

span.span: The that contains the changes to the view state.

returns.span: 如果沒有與物件關聯的檢視狀態，則這個方法會傳回 。

span.span: If there is no view state associated with the object, this method returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法主要由控制項開發人員使用。This method is used primarily by control developers. 檢視狀態是伺服器控制項的屬性值的累積。View state is the accumulation of the values of a server control's properties. 這些值會自動放入伺服器控制項的屬性，這是執行個體的類別。These values are automatically placed in the server control's property, which is an instance of the class. 儲存狀態的伺服器控制項的生命週期的階段之後，這個屬性的值然後會保存到字串物件。This property's value is then persisted to a string object after the save state stage of the server control life cycle. 這個字串物件儲存檢視狀態時，會為儲存在 HTML 中的變數傳回給用戶端`hidden`項目。When view state is saved, this string object is returned to the client as a variable that is stored in an HTML `hidden` element. 當您撰寫自訂的伺服器控制項時，您可以透過覆寫這個方法，並修改您的伺服器控制項來改善效率屬性。When you author custom server controls, you can improve efficiency by overriding this method and modifying your server control's property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetDirty() cil managed

summary.span: 標記 物件，以便將其狀態記錄在檢視狀態中。

span.span: Marks the object so its state will be recorded in view state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法就會呼叫直接方法，以標記物件，使其狀態會記錄在檢視狀態。The method is called directly by the method, to mark the object so that its state is recorded in view state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法主要由控制項開發人員使用。This method is used primarily by control developers. 檢視狀態是伺服器控制項的屬性值的累積。View state is the accumulation of the values of a server control's properties. 這些值會自動放入伺服器控制項的屬性，這是執行個體的類別。These values are automatically placed in the server control's property, which is an instance of the class. 儲存狀態的伺服器控制項的生命週期的階段之後，這個屬性的值然後會保存到字串物件。This property's value is then persisted to a string object after the save state stage of the server control life cycle. 這個字串物件儲存檢視狀態時，會為儲存在 HTML 中的變數傳回給用戶端`hidden`項目。When view state is saved, this string object is returned to the client as a variable that is stored in an HTML `hidden` element. 當您撰寫自訂的伺服器控制項時，您可以透過覆寫這個方法，並修改您的伺服器控制項來改善效率屬性。When you author custom server controls, you can improve efficiency by overriding this method and modifying your server control's property.

summary.span: 取得或設定參數的型別。

The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類型可用來建立強型別的參數，以便您 Web 應用程式與基礎程式碼之間轉換的值正確。The type can be used to create strongly typed parameters, so that values are converted correctly between your Web application and underlying code. 如果變更參數的型別，方法呼叫。If the type of the parameter is changed, the method is called. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定， ，和屬性物件時使用它們做為輸出參數和傳回值參數，預存程序。The following code example demonstrates how to set the , , and properties of objects when using them as output parameters and return value parameters with a stored procedure. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class overview. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs_1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs_1/CS/sql21cs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs_1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs_1/VB/sql21vb.aspx#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Protected ReadOnly Property ViewState As StateBag
protected: property System::Web::UI::StateBag ^ ViewState { System::Web::UI::StateBag ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得狀態資訊的字典，允許您在相同頁面的多個要求之間，儲存和還原 物件的檢視狀態。

span.span: Gets a dictionary of state information that allows you to save and restore the view state of a object across multiple requests for the same page.

value.span: 的執行個體，包含 物件的檢視狀態資訊。

span.span: An instance of that contains the object's view-state information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 參數的檢視狀態是累積的所有屬性值。A parameter's view state is the accumulation of all its property values. 若要保留這些值在 HTTP 要求，ASP.NET 伺服器控制項使用這個屬性，也就是執行個體的類別，以儲存屬性值。To preserve these values across HTTP requests, ASP.NET server controls use this property, which is an instance of the class, to store the property values. 值接著會當做變數傳遞至 HTML`hidden`輸入項目時，處理後續要求。The values are then passed as a variable to an HTML `hidden` input element when subsequent requests are processed. 預設為所有的伺服器控制項的啟用檢視狀態。View state is enabled for all server controls by default. 如需字典和使用方式的詳細資訊，請參閱[集合和資料結構](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/60cc581f-1db5-445b-ba04-a173396bf872)。For more information about dictionaries and how to use them, see [Collections and Data Structures](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/60cc581f-1db5-445b-ba04-a173396bf872). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用檢視狀態物件參數物件的狀態儲存在該類別可擴充類別。The following code example demonstrates how to use the view-state object to store parameter object state in a class that extends the class. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class overview. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter_2#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter_2/CS/staticparameter.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter_2#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter_2/VB/staticparameter.vb#5)]
